thread.title: Women’s U/20 Team Named: World Cup Qualifier
thread.title_full: Women’s U/20 Team Named: World Cup Qualifier

author: M
title: Women’s U/20 Team Named: World Cup Qualifier
text:
October 9, 2015 | 0 Comments 
The Bermuda Football Association today [Oct 9] announced the Under 20 Women’s National Teams that will participate in Group 2 of the Caribbean Football Union U 20 World Cup Qualifiers. 
The ladies depart Bermuda Monday October 12th, 2015 to travel to Haiti where they will play against Puerto Rico and group hosts Haiti. The top two teams in the group will play the top 2 teams from group 1 with the top two teams moving into the CONCACAF Qualifying Tournament. 
The team will open the competition October 14th vs Puerto Rico at 6:00pm. Four days later Bermuda will close the group stage October 18th vs Haiti at 6:00pm. All matches will be played in the Stade Sylvio Cator. 
The team:
